description: Returns a list of the standards that are currently enabled.

parameters.name: StandardsSubscriptionArns
parameters.description: The list of the standards subscription ARNs for the standards to retrieve. (string) ---

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is required for pagination. On your first call to the GetEnabledStandards operation, set the value of this parameter to NULL. For subsequent calls to the operation, to continue listing data, set the value of this parameter to the value returned from the previous response.

nested_items.name: StandardsSubscriptions
nested_items.description: The list of StandardsSubscriptions objects that include information about the enabled standards.

nested_items.name: StandardsSubscriptionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource that represents your subscription to the standard.

nested_items.name: StandardsInput
nested_items.description: A key-value pair of input for the standard.

nested_items.name: StandardsStatus
nested_items.description: The status of your subscription to the standard. Possible values are:
PENDING - The standard is in the process of being enabled. Or the standard is already enabled and Security Hub is adding new controls to the standard.
INCOMPLETE - The standard could not be enabled completely. One or more errors ( StandardsStatusReason) occurred when Security Hub attempted to enable the standard.
DELETING - The standard is in the process of being disabled.
FAILED - The standard could not be disabled. One or more errors ( StandardsStatusReason) occurred when Security Hub attempted to disable the standard.

nested_items.name: StandardsControlsUpdatable
nested_items.description: Specifies whether you can retrieve information about and configure individual controls that apply to the standard. Possible values are:
READY_FOR_UPDATES - Controls in the standard can be retrieved and configured.
NOT_READY_FOR_UPDATES - Controls in the standard cannot be retrieved or configured.

nested_items.name: StandardsStatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the current status.

nested_items.name: StatusReasonCode
nested_items.description: The reason code that represents the reason for the current status of a standard subscription.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to request the next page of results.
